overview: Two former lovers, one a former IPL cricket star and the other the wealthy owner of an IPL team, who have not seen each other in a year are thrust together once again after one is brutally attacked. In the course of an evening, they rediscover their profound love for one another and why they tragically can never be together.
tagline: Two former gay lovers meet after two years to discover they are still very much in love, but can never be together.
title: Not Out
